name: fmptd2f
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))

stmt.origin: fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, c1, w0)
stmt.pretty: fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c2, c1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

body.origin: |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Domain and codomain of the mapping operation; deduction form. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
